articles.content:
(WHTM) — The CVS MinuteClinic in York reports strep throat this week.

articles.author: Ike Swetlitz
articles.title: Penicillin in Shortage as Syphilis, Strep Cases Rise in US - Bloomberg
articles.description: A common type of penicillin used to treat syphilis is in short supply in the US as cases of the sexually transmitted disease continue to rise.
articles.content:
A common type of penicillin used to treat syphilis is in short supply in the US as cases of the sexually transmitted disease continue to rise.
